function.name: trigger_github_workflow
function.description: Trigger a GitHub Actions workflow and monitor its execution. Use this to start automated builds, deployments, or other CI/CD processes. Returns run ID and tracker ID for monitoring.

owner.description: Repository owner (optional, uses config default if not provided)

ref.description: Git reference - branch or tag (optional, defaults to 'main')

tracker_id.description: Unique tracker ID for monitoring (optional, auto-generated if not provided)
